snippet: Mallinckrodt said that it expected the deal, the latest by a drug maker, to bolster its presence in hospitals.
abstract: DealBook Online; Mallinckrodt Pharmaceuticals says it will buy Ikaria, maker of treatments for critically sick infants, for $2.3 billion.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: Mallinckrodt said that it expected the deal, the latest by a drug maker, to bolster its presence in hospitals.

headline.main: Mallinckrodt to Buy Drug Maker Ikaria for $2.3 Billion
